title: Zigzag Journeys in Europe: Vacation Rambles in Historic Lands
author: Butterworth, Hezekiah
snippet: The Jewel Tower did not so much excite the boys' astonishment. It waslike a costumer's shop; and even the royal crown of England wore analmost ridiculous look, civilization and republican progress have sofar outgrown these theatrical playthings.
